turns.speaker: client
turns.text: can you please order me a drink from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yeah sure, which location should i go to?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the one on court street between pacific and dean street

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok what would you like to drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I dont want something too strong, do you have any advice on what tastes good?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they have many flavors and chocolate mixed drinks

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: you are right i should get a chocolate drink instead of coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yeah you already drank coffee anyway so you might a well try something new

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah how about the white chocolate mocha, that sounds good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i tried that before it is great!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok good can i get a size large

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yeah sure what type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: tell them the 2% milk

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok np what else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: i want extra whip cream on top so please add that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: yeah no problem

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thanks also im thinking can you ask them if they can add almond milk in their too

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want 2% milk and almond milk together>

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yeah lets try that

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok no problem what else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: thats it im good

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so let me repeat just incase: large white chocolate mocha with extra whip cream and a mix of 2% milk and almond milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: yep perfect

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok your order is in at the court street location and you will recieve a text message of your receipt and when it is ready they will let you know

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok thanks see you later

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok bye
